$schema.description: Schema definition for the map definitions to be loaded on Arcana Pixel

minZoom.description: Minimum posible zoom on the map

minNativeZoom.description: Minimum zoom level of the folder of the sliced map. Take a look at Leaflet's documentation to understand how it works: https://leafletjs.com/reference.html#gridlayer-minnativezoom

maxZoom.description: Maximum posible zoom on the map

maxNativeZoom.description: Maximum zoom level of the folder of the sliced map. Take a look at Leaflet's documentation to understand how it works: https://leafletjs.com/reference.html#gridlayer-maxnativezoom

sizeChangeFactor.description: Used o manipulate the distances in the map to make them longer (increasing this value) or shorter (decresing this value). Usefull for changing travel time in games such as D&D

bounds.description: Limits of the map, used to avoid loading and seeing tiles out of bounds For smaller maps this can turn to be difficult to navigate in the map, so it's optional.

center.description: Coordinate pair of the center of the map (start position)

config.description: Map configuration, such as zoom, center, bounds, etc.

preview.description: URL of the map's preview image

size.description: Size of the title Usually something between 150 (large) and 30 (small)

titles.description: List of titles to be displayed on the map (usually for continents and larger areas)

category.description: Category of the location, used to group similar markers into a single "layer". This is usefull for toggling the visibility of the markers by it's categoy/type/layer.

icon.description: Icon to show in the marker. Is the name of the marker from FontAwesome, search for your icon at https://fontawesome.com/search?ic=free Only free icons are supported (we are looking t change to a Open Source free alternative in the near future)

isVisible.description: Toggle the visibility of the location. his can be changed later while using the map (only the master can change it)

text.description: Text to show in the marker's tooltip

description.description: Description shown in the sidebar after clicking the marker

master_description.description: Description shown in the sidebar after clicking the marker that is visible ONLY for the master of the game

locations.description: List of location markers (pins) to be displayed on the map

description: Schema definition for maps that will be loaded on Arcana Pixel
